Name: Heracles
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with The Sword of Heracles.
Faction_Abilities: - Add 2” to this model’s Movement Characteristic.
- Add 2” to this model’s Dash Characteristic.
- Re-roll failed hit rolls for attacks made by this model.
- Re-roll failed wound rolls for attacks made by this model.
- Improve this model’s Armour Save Characteristic by 1.
- This model has a 6+ Durability Characteristic.
- Add 1 to this model’s Attacks Characteristic.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.
In the Tactics Step, this model may perform a Strength Test. Each time a Strength Test is passed, select one of the following effects to apply to this model until the end of the round
